Header.location: At the top of the page
Header.description: Title, Search Input, Icon and Dropdowns in flex container

Sidebar.description: List items in the container, Dropdown and Button

PageTitle.location: below the Header and to the right of Sidebar
PageTitle.description: main heading for the content section

CTA.description: contains icon and text in flex container

Table.description: a table with 10 rows and 4 columns containing names, amount, status, and date

Pagination.location: at the bottom of the Table in the TableFooter
Pagination.description: It allows the table data to paginate

functionality.Pagination: a feature that allows the table data to be paginated
